scripts.install-local-dependencies: rm -rf amp-story-linter && npm pack ../linter && tar xfz amp-story-linter-0.0.1.tgz && mv package amp-story-linter && rm amp-story-linter-0.0.1.tgz
scripts.deploy: $npm_execpath run install-local-dependencies && tsc && gcloud app deploy --project $PROJECT_ID
scripts.watch: ls *.ts *.hbs | entr -r bash -c 'tsc && env ORIGIN=http://localhost:8080 node app.js'
